description: Try our easy to follow Artichoke & Fennel Dip recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Dip & spread,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free
name: Artichoke & Fennel Dip Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put all the ingredients in a blender or food processor, and whizz or blend until smooth and creamy. Season with salt and black pepper.
Serve with some grilled Turkish bread, toasted pitta bread, or ciabatta. Alternatively, spoon it over a fresh tomato and parsley salad.
